00009 #import "RMCallTests.h"
00010 #import "MockProtocol.h"
00011 #import "MockProtocol2.h"
00012 #import "MockProtocolShouldSend.h"
00013 #import "Mock.h"
00014 #import "WIRemoting.h"
00015 
00016 @implementation RMCallTests
00017 
00018 #pragma mark test set up
00019 
00020 - (void) setUp
00021 {
00022   protocol = [[MockProtocol alloc] init];
00023   call = [[RMCall alloc] initWithProtocol:protocol];
00024 }
00025 
00026 - (void) tearDown
00027 {
00028   [call release];
00029   [protocol release];
00030 }
00031 
00032 #pragma mark unit tests
00033 
00034 - (void) testSingleProtocol {
00035   Mock *m = [[Mock alloc] initWithObject:self
00036                                 finished:@selector(callEchoFinished:)
00037                                   failed:@selector(failed:error:)];
00038   [call call:@"echo" arguments:
00039    [NSDictionary
00040     dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:
00041     @"hello world", @"echo",
00042     nil] delegate:m];
00043   
00044   [m release];
00045 }
00046 
00047 - (void) testMultipleProtocols
00048 {
00049   Mock *m = [[Mock alloc] initWithObject:self
00050                                 finished:@selector(callMultipleJsonEchoFinished:)
00051                                   failed:@selector(failed:error:)];
00052   MockProtocol2 *proto2 = [[MockProtocol2 alloc] init];
00053   
00054   [call pushProtocol:proto2];
00055   // protocol 2 will change _method to json_echo2
00056   
00057   [call call:@"echo" arguments:
00058    [NSDictionary
00059     dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:
00060     @"hello world", @"echo",
00061     @"hello world 2", @"echo2",
00062     nil] delegate:m];
00063   
00064   [proto2 release];
00065   [m release];
00066   
00067   // get the top protocol. the top protocol should be MockProtocol2
00068   STAssertTrue([[call topProtocol] isKindOfClass:[MockProtocol2 class]],
00069                @"The top protocol is expected to be MockProtocol2, but it is %@.",
00070                [MockProtocol2 class]);
00071   
00072   // pop the protocol out then it should behave with only one protocol
00073   [call popProtocol];
00074   
00075   m = [[Mock alloc] initWithObject:self
00076                                 finished:@selector(callEchoFinished:)
00077                                   failed:@selector(failed:error:)];
00078   [call call:@"echo" arguments:
00079    [NSDictionary
00080     dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:
00081     @"hello world", @"echo",
00082     nil] delegate:m];
00083   
00084   [m release];
00085 }
00086 
00087 - (void) testStraightCall
00088 {
00089   Mock *m = [[Mock alloc] initWithObject:self
00090                                 finished:@selector(callMultipleJsonEchoFinished:)
00091                                   failed:@selector(failed:error:)];
00092   MockProtocol2 *proto2 = [[MockProtocol2 alloc] init];
00093   
00094   // protocol 2 will change _method to json_echo2
00095   [call call:@"echo"
00096    arguments:[NSDictionary
00097               dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:
00098               @"hello world", @"echo",
00099               @"hello world 2", @"echo2",
00100               nil]
00101     delegate:m
00102     protocol:proto2];
00103   
00104   [proto2 release];
00105   [m release];
00106 }
00107 
00108 - (void) testRequestShouldSend
00109 {
00110   Mock *m = [[Mock alloc] initWithObject:self
00111                                 finished:@selector(callEchoFinished:)
00112                                   failed:@selector(failed:error:)];
00113   
00114   MockProtocolShouldSend *p2 = [[MockProtocolShouldSend alloc] init];
00115   
00116   [call pushProtocol:p2];
00117   
00118   BOOL r = [call call:@"echo"
00119             arguments:[NSDictionary
00120                        dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:
00121                        @"hello world", @"echo",
00122                        nil]
00123              delegate:m];
00124   if (r) {
00125     STFail(@"The call shouldn't be sent.");
00126   }
00127   
00128   [call popProtocol];
00129   [p2 release];
00130   [m release];}
00131 
00132 #pragma mark assistant methods
00133 
00134 - (void) callMultipleJsonEchoFinished:(RMResponse *) response
00135 {
00136   id obj = [[response responseString] JSONValue];
00137   if (nil != obj && [obj isKindOfClass:[NSDictionary class]]) {
00138     STAssertTrue([[obj valueForKey:@"echo"] isEqual:@"hello world"],
00139                  @"Call json_echo2 should receive what we sent, but \"%@\" received",
00140                  [obj valueForKey:@"echo"]);
00141     STAssertTrue([[obj valueForKey:@"echo2"] isEqual:@"hello world 2"],
00142                  @"Call json_echo2 should receive what we sent, but \"%@\" received",
00143                  [obj valueForKey:@"echo2"]);
00144   }
00145   else {
00146     STFail(@"The response should contain a dictionary object.");
00147   }
00148 }
00149 
00150 - (void) callEchoFinished:(RMResponse *) response
00151 {
00152   STAssertTrue([[response responseString]
00153                 isEqualToString:@"hello world"],
00154                  @"Call Echo should receive what we sent, but \"%@\" received.",
00155                 [response responseString]);
00156 }
00157 
00158 - (void) failed:(RMResponse *) response
00159               error:(NSError *) error
00160 {
00161   NSLog(@"%@\n", [error localizedFailureReason]);
00162   NSLog(@"%@\n", [response responseString]);
00163   STFail([error localizedFailureReason]);
00164 }
